name: stockx_search
description: Search StockX. Search sneakers, streetwear, and collectibles. Returns names, prices, and price changes.

steps.code: const results = []; document.querySelectorAll('[data-testid="product-card"], [class*="ProductCard"], [class*="tile"] a').forEach((el, i) => { if (i < 15) { const nameEl = el.querySelector('p, [class*="name"], h3'); const priceEl = el.querySelector('[class*="price"], [class*="amount"]'); const imgEl = el.querySelector('img'); results.push({ name: nameEl?.textContent?.trim() || '', price: priceEl?.textContent?.trim() || '', image: imgEl?.src || '', url: el.href || el.querySelector('a')?.href || '' }); } }); return { query: '{{query}}', result_count: results.length, results };
steps.name: search_results
steps.label: Extract results
